string.text: Find the Wish Granter
Finding the Wish Granter is every stalker's dream. There is information that he is exactly inside Chernobyl, in the 4th block.
Meet with Sidorovich
According to stories from the big land, there is somewhere behind the checkpoint a cellar of a merchant who could help me get settled into the Zone.
Meet Colonel Petrenko
Petrenko is waiting for me, you don't have to keep him waiting longer.
Meet Lukash
Freedom leader Lukash wants to meet with you.
Meet Cold
Meet with Cold in the Clear Sky base.
Meet Professor Sakharov
Professor Sakharov has an assignment for you.
Meet Dushman
Talk to Dushman.
Meet Major Kuznetsov
Report to Major Kuznetsov.
Meet Sultan
Sultan wants to meet with you.
Meet Preacher
Seek guidance from the wise Preacher.
Meet with Sidorovich
Sidorovich in Cordon is your next destination.
Meet with Klin
Need to meet Klin, you can usually find him in one of the cellars in the novice village of Cordona.
Meet with Beard
Beard aboard the Skadovsk is your next destination.
Meet with Noah
Noah in Zaton is your next destination.
Meet with Colonel Petrenko
Colonel Petrenko in Rostok is your next destination.
Meet with Gromov
Gromov is a tech at the bar, asked me to help him.
Meet with Lukash
Lukash in the Military Warehouses is your next destination.
Meet with Loki
Loki's got some business for me.
Meet with Cold
Ex-bartender wants to discuss something with me.
Meet with Librarian
Librarian in the Great Swamp is your next destination.
Meet with Professor Sakharov
Professor Sakharov in Yantar is your next destination.
Meet with Tukarev.
Tukarev needs my help, he needs a look in his bunker.
Meet with Dushman
Dushman in Dead City is your next destination.
Meet with Hog
Hog in Dead City is your next destination.
Meet with Major Kuznetsov
Major Kuznetsov in Agoroprom is your next destination.
Meet with Lieutenant Kirilov
Lieutenant Kirilov in Agoroprom is your next destination.
Meet with Sultan
Sultan in Dark Valley is your next destination.
Meet with Olivius
Olivius in Dark Valley is your next destination.
To appear before the Preacher
The Preacher wants me to do the will of the Monolith.
To meet Father Diodore.
Father Diodor made an appointment to give me instructions from Monolith.
Find %s for Clear Sky
Stalker asked me to bring him %s. The deadline is 3 days.
Yeah, stalker, I need some help. I'm making a hiding place for a bad day, just in case, you know. I need some stuff for that. If you can get it, I'll make it worth your while.
I've got a job to do. I don't have any money, I can't even buy consumables properly. Can you get me something? I'll thank you as much as I can, maybe I'll have some money by then.

The thing is, I had an argument with a local dealer, and now there's nowhere to get me consumables. And the asshole's assortment is so bad, I can't get what I need. Maybe you can help me get something.
So... do you have {item_count} {item_name}? Or do you know where to get it? Just don't make me wait too long. I think 3 days would be enough for your eyes. Okay?
Bring me {item_count} {item_name} and I won't be in debt. The sooner you bring it, the better, but in 3 days you may not even look for me. Okay?
Look, let me think about it, I didn't think you'd be interested... We need to get {item_count} {item_name}. Your deadline is 3 days. Can you handle it?
Thank you, man! You're so good. Take the money:
Find %s for Freedom member
Freeman asked me to bring him %s. The deadline is 3 days.
Here's the thing - my stash was robbed, you know? Sounds like he was hiding it well, hell... I didn't have any supplies at all. Could you at least get something?
Man, our merchant isn't provided at all. I thought I'd buy something from him, but I don't. Can you at least get me some supplies somewhere?
There is such a problem, in short, we have supply problems. Our base is far from the perimeter, the goods are difficult to bring. Anyway, can you find something for me?

I don't know what would be more important right away... So... Well, bring me at least {item_count} {item_name}. Do you have any? Look, when you do, let me know, but don't take too long, you can do it in three days. If you can get it, I won't be in debt.
I need {item_count} {item_name}. If you think I'm going to wait forever, I'm not, three days max. Will you do it?
Okay, well, we still need to find {item_count} {item_name}. I'll give you 3 days to find it. I'll reward you with something. Well, I guess that's it.
Thank you, you helped me out. Here you go:
Meat for Clear Sky
A Clear Sky fighter asked me to find him the %s. The deadline is 2 days.

I heard some news recently that the mutants might start migrating soon, pulling them northwards. I'm worried about this situation, I'm afraid I'll be left without meat. Of course there'll be others to replace them, but will they have meat to eat? So I'm going to stock up on meat. Can you help with that? I'll be sure to do that.

You know, it's all bullshit about mutant meat being dangerous, with viruses or parasites or whatever the hell it is. I want to grill it, but I don't have time to hunt it. Why don't you hunt for me and get a few pieces?

I was recently told an exotic recipe by the men, but not enough ingredients. Specifically, mutant meat. I'd go hunting myself, but I don't have the time or the opportunity. Maybe you could do it, huh?
I need {item_count} {item_name}. Look, I won't wait weeks, I'll give you 2 days, tops.

Well, it won't be too hard to get. I need quickly {item_count} {item_name}. I'll give you 2 days, because I know the workmen, if they don't bring it right away, they'll never bring it. Well, will you do it?
Have to get {item_count} {item_name}, okay? I won't be in debt. Just look, don't take too long with the case. 2 days, I think you've had enough.
Yes! I'm going to eat good tonight! Thank you stalker, here is your payment. Oh, and here, I have some ammo that is the wrong calibre for my rifle, you can have it.
Find %s for Stalker
%s, the stalker needs that artefact. The deadline is 6 days.
Can you find an artifact? I need it so bad! Don't worry, it's not for sale or order, there's another matter. So, will you do it?
Listen, a friend of mine is sick, and he needs help right away. I have to get him an artifact that is said to have healing properties, and I may have a chance to save him.
I've been involved in a case, it's a long story. Long story short, I owe an artifact. I've been trying to find it, but no luck. If I don't return my debt, I'm screwed, can you help me out?

Have you been hunting for artifacts at all? Well, I think you can find it, it's not that hard. If you find {item_name}, let me know. The reward will be more than worth it, but don't take too long, I need it in 6 days.
So here's the deal: you have 6 days maximum. {item_name} is the kind of artifact I need, I'll give you over and above what the traders or scientists offer. All right?

Yeah, I'm not too good with artifacts myself. I almost got sucked into a vortex once... Nevermind... You have to get {item_name}. If you don't get it within 6 days, there's no reward. Well, there you go..
Finally! You don't know how long I've been looking for him. Here, yes... Take it:
Find %s for stalker.
%s - we need to get that weapon. The deadline is 6 days.
Scum, rats, they're all the same, eh... Anyway, someone robbed my stash, and there was a gun... It was as good as mine. Could you find a replacement?
There is one problem. The merchants have a very poor range of weapons, and there is nothing to order. And I need weapons, new and in one piece. You understand?

Look, I lost my gun, maybe it was stolen. I don't know, it's my own fault. Can you help me find a replacement with one just like it? I'm not too friendly with the local dealer, he can't get me one to order.

I'm looking for {item_name}. My stash was robbed the other day and my favourite gun was stolen. I loved that gun. But be warned, if you bring a scrap, it's worthless, and I'll have to pay to have it repaired. I'll give you 6 days to find it.
{item_name} is the kind I need. I'll pay depending on its condition. Just don't drag it out, okay? I'll give you 6 days.
Just remember, if you bring me rusty shit, don't count on a lot of money. I need {item_name}. I'm not going to wait long either, in 6 days you can find a hell of a lot. Okay?
Thank you, brother. I won't forget such help! Now at least I'll go hunting... Here, take my humble reward:
Find %s for duty
%s - we need to get these weapons in perfect condition. The deadline is 6 days.

I want to ask you to do one thing for me personally, you know? Right now, we're in the middle of a territorial battle. We have a small operation coming up, and I wouldn't want to break my gun in incessant firefights in terrible conditions. Can you find a temporary gun for me?
Yes, you might be able to help me. My junior partner would do well to find a bigger gun, my grandfather's TOZ is reliable and efficient, but it's only good for hunting, you know. Can you help me?

I need my gun repaired, so I have the tools, I have all kinds of small things, but I don't have the main parts to replace it, not even the trigger. I had to go to the local technicians, you know, they would charge me three time more for a small thing. In short, I decided to find a donor to replace the parts, and you could help me with that.
I need {item_name}. Can you get it in, like, 6 days? Condition doesn't really matter, but you know I won't give you much for junk.

Okay, let me think about it... We had a few options. {item_name} will do basically, yes. There's definitely enough weeks to look for. And about it's condition, the better it is, the more you get. Is that okay?
Specifically, you'll have 6 days, a penny depending on the condition of the barrel... Most importantly, I forgot, I need to get {item_name}. Well, somehow.
Perfect! Thing! Here, take the work:
Release from captivity
The stalker's buddy was kidnapped by a group of gangsters, we need to release him. The deadline is 2 days.
A fellow stalker has been kidnapped by a group of bandits and needs to be freed. The deadline is two days.

Bro, I really need help. My partner has been kidnapped by bandits, demanding a big ransom... I don't have that kind of money, you know, and it's not realistic to raise it in a short period of time. And even if I do, there's no guarantee they won't kill him. I really don't know what to do now. Do you think you can save him? But it has to be quick, I think they'll keep him for a couple of days at the most.

Man, you don't look like Rambo, but maybe you can at least help me. I need to get a stalker out of captivity. You see, I owe him my life, and he might actually die because of me. I know where those freaks are holding him, and I heard that they're going to send him digging through radioactive piles of rubbish for artifacts in a couple of days. They don't live long there, in case you didn't know. Can you help me out? I'll make it worth your while.

There's an asshole here who's always getting into shit. This time he got caught by the bandits, and he owes me a lot of money, and I know he's got it in his stash. If you get him out and bring him to me, I'll pay you well.
Well done, you're a real man, I see! I never thought I'd see my friend alive! Here's to the trouble:
Rescue operation
Get a Duty out of Freedom's captivity before they kill him. Deadline is 2 days.

Man, we've got a big problem: the anarchist freaks took my brother-in-arms prisoner, I won't tell you how it happened - long story. You know, we could do a whole rescue mission, but if we go in there in droves, they'll shoot him. Why don't you try a sneak attack, huh? Come on, it's only 2 days or they'll feed him to the mutants, damn those junkies.

You might as well help. Our scout, my good comrade, was taken prisoner, and now the junkies are charging us for his release. The command is still undecided whether to take him by force or to meet the demands, and time is running out, he only has a couple of days left to live. Will you do it quietly?

Uh, trouble for us... Our patrol was attacked by the bandit rats, already at nightfall, when the boys were on their way back to the barracks. One fighter survived, but he was hardly lucky: they took him hostage and, guess what, sold him to freedom so they could blackmail us. We still can't get close to our comrade so he won't get shot first, the fucking weedheads have their eyes everywhere. Maybe you could try and free him. Can't stall any longer - we've got a couple of days to pay the bail.
Thank you, brother. Beat down our comrade! Nice work. Here you go - from the bottom of my heart:
Help the prisoner
Stalker asked me to rescue a freeman who's being held hostage. The deadline is 2 days.

Man, help... My partner and I were in a lot of trouble... We ran into some scumbags, I hid in some barn, my partner went into the bushes. And disappeared. Then yesterday I got a message on my PDA, my partner was taken hostage and they were threatening to kill me if I didn't get the money in time. I'm desperate, I got no money, I don't know what to do. I got 2 days left on my deadline. Can you help me?
Thank you, brother. It's great to see your comrade alive again! But you can't put thank you in your pocket. So you'll get it and sign it:
Save a hostage
Save the scientist from captivity. The deadline is 2 days.

Yes, please help! During research, our group was attacked and one of my colleagues was kidnapped. They are demanding a ransom and said that if he is not there in two days, they will shoot him. Can you help save him?
Thank you, stalker. On behalf of world science, I express my gratitude. It is great to see you and our friend alive again! Here, for your concern:
Hunting the hunter
Stalker asks for help - there is a bounty on his head, and he has promised to pay twice as much if he can finish off his client in 2 days.

Yeah, help me, brother! Here's the thing... I'm in deep shit. Some bastard put a price on my head even though I'm innocent. Take care of him and I'll pay double. And you'll have to do it faster than they do, you've got 2 days max.
Oh, thank you, stalker! Here's the reward. I can finally sleep in peace for the first time in days!
Vengeance
Stalker asked to avenge the death of his comrade. The execution time is 2 days.

Last night a bandit snuck into our camp and killed my sleeping friend. There's no mercy for such scum. Of course, I'm sorry I'm signing you up for the wet stuff, but that bastard deserved no better. Kill him for me, stalker, I'll give you 2 days. After that, I'll give you some of my dead comrade's stuff.
Thank you. Join me for a drink to our fallen brother. And take something:
%s for bro
%s - we need to find this for my brother. The deadline is 3 days.
Need some gear, can you find it?
You want to make some money, don't you? Look, I need some stuff here. I could use {item_count} {item_name}. I'll get my reward, don't worry. Don't wait too long. I need it in 3 days.
Hammer, catch a crab:
%s for the military
%s - we need to find this for a co-worker. The deadline is 3 days.
I'm about to go on guard duty and my rucksack is almost empty, no first aid kits, no food. Can you give me a hand?
Here's the thing: I join the guard in three days, and I need to get {item_count} {item_name}. I'll give you something as a reward, okay?
Well, thank you, you helped! Here's what I promised:
Find %s artefact
%s - the soldier asked me to find it. The deadline is 6 days.

Look, buddy... I know it's against the rules... I'm going to the demo soon, I'm going home, and I want to bring a souvenir. Well, don't bring home the head of the flesh. Do you think you can find an artifact for me? Just don't pull it, you won't have more than three days. Don't think I'm not gonna get lucky with that fucking stone, I have a hidden container special. I think it's gonna be a great souvenir.
Anyway, can you get me an artifact {item_name}? You'll get a decent reward. Remember, you have 6 days before I leave.
Well done! All right, give him here... Now the important thing is that the commander doesn't find out. Get back to work, too:
Big deal
%s - get it out and get it to the bandit. Term of execution - 6 days.
Look, there's a case coming up and I need a wave that can't be traced. You know what I mean? Can you help me?
{item_name} is exactly what the doctor prescribed. Where can you get it? Buy it, steal it, find it, doesn't matter. I'll pay you double, don't piss, but I need it in 6 days.
That's what I promised you. And you never saw me, smoked me?
One shot
One soldier bet I couldn't kill an important target. The deadline is two days.

I overheard something with the edge of my ear, made a deal with someone, and there's a case here. I know the location of a particular target with a high priority for elimination. I bet you can't even get close to it, let alone more? If you can, the fee's in half. I'll give you two days.
Really? Did you really do it? Hell, if I'd known you had any chance, I never would have made that bet. Well, a deal's a deal. Here you go:
Order
You signed up for a contract killing. The deadline is two days.

We've received an order from serious people - a stalker must be killed alone. He's just in the middle of a shack. If you kill him, you can keep the hubar. Plus, I'll pay you upstairs. Just keep in mind that the contract has to be completed on time, you don't have more than two days. Okay?
Here's a little cash reward for you, as agreed:
Destroy the enemies.
Attack the infidels for the glory of Monolith. The deadline is 2 days.
Brother, we have found the enemy. We are gathering our brothers for battle. Get over there now. Destroy them. Just don't keep the Monolith waiting, 2 days is the maximum we have.
The Monolith favors us, brother. Take these gifts:
Intelligence
Scout the area where enemy forces were spotted. The deadline is 24 hours.
There's a report of an enemy squad. I'm looking for a scout to prepare an attack. We need to scout the area, but we can't put it off, so, brother, you don't have more than 24 hours.
Wait... That's it. Look at the PDA, the coordinates I sent you. Let's go.
Okay, take these gifts as a token of gratitude:
Destroy the dangerous mutants
Destroy dangerous mutants. The deadline is 3 days.

There's been a lot of dogs lately that haven't been cut, barely had their legs taken away. I'll pay if you reduce their numbers a little, and of course I'll show the PDA their supposed lair. Just don't drag them out before they migrate, okay? Three days, I think that's enough.
So... All right, look at your PDA, I gave you the coordinates. Good luck with that.
Thank you. Take it as a reward:
Clear the area for research
The area where the research will be conducted must be secured. Term of execution - 3 days.

I understand perfectly well that the military must provide for us all, but they are helpless children! I have been entrusted with important research, but there is an obstacle in the form of mutants, which must be removed within a maximum of 3 days. Will you help me remove them?
Thank you, stalker, you helped me. Please accept this as a token of my gratitude:
%s for one of the brothers
One of the brothers is sick. %s will help him. The deadline is 3 days.
I must be strong to serve the Monolith, but I confess my strength is weakening. No matter how you twist it, you also need material means. Can you help me, Brother?
Father Diodore kindly offered to pray for me, but I'm sure I just need treatment. I need {item_count} {item_name}. Please bring me this and don't put it off too long, I could die.
Thank you, brother. Take it, take:
Search
Stalker gave a lead on a good stash. For a PDA in the stash, he offers a reward. The deadline is 24 hours.

I don't like to make people into postmen, but I have to go now. I know where a good stash with an equally good PDA is. Bring me a PDA from it, I'll pay for it, and the rest is yours. I don't know how long this good stuff's gonna lie there, so don't drag it out for more than 24 hours, okay?
Look in your PDA, I dropped the coordinates. Good luck.
Thank you, stalker! Here, take this:
%s. We need a tissue sample.
%s - the scientist needs a tissue sample from this. The deadline is 3 days.
The job says... I'm researching some mutants in this field. I need someone to collect tissue samples for me, preferably in the shortest possible time and no more than 3 days.
{item_name} is the object of my research. If you could hunt for me, I would pay you for the trouble and, of course, the considerable risk involved. All I need is {item_count} samples.
Thank you. It'll be very helpful in my research. Please accept:
Postman
Deliver the cargo to the freeman. Delivery time - 3 days.
Buddy, I'm expecting a package and I need someone to pick it up. You want to make some money on it? Look, just don't drag it out, you've had enough for three days.
Thank you, ma'am. As agreed:
Documents for "Clear Skies"
Clear Sky man asked for his papers back.
I have some important documents that I hid when I was attacked by a mutant brat. You know, I'm afraid to go back there. If you can get them, I'd be happy to pay for the job.
Well, you're brave, though! Yes, take your reward:
Defeat Monolith's attack.
The Monolith fighters have been spotted and must be stopped. The deadline is 24 hours.

Man, our valiant intelligence reports that there's a Monolith squad nearby. We should go deal with these freaks. Lukash doesn't know yet, but we're with the mustache. We just have to do it fast, the maximum you have is 24 hours before they attack or ambush us.
Well done. Lukash sent reinforcements, but we didn't need them. He asked me to give you this as a reward:
Interception
Intercept enemy forces. The deadline is 24 hours.

Okay, so we have an emergency situation. There are gangsters on the move, I need to warn my superiors immediately and stop them. You need to hold them off until I get back. We need to move out now, 24 hours at the most. Okay?
Well done, you should be in the Special Forces. Here's a present from us:
Redemption
Kill the enemy of Monolith. The deadline is 2 days.

My brother, the Preacher asked me to kill one of the infidels for the good of Monolith. I failed because I was unable to get to the target. Will you fulfill my task and atone for my failure? There is little time left, two days to be exact.
You've done well. It is an honor to serve the Almighty Monolith with you. Take it, don't be shy:
%s - find it for a mercenary
%s - we need to find this for the mercenary. The deadline is three days.
Would you do me a favor? I need to find some consumables.
I have few supplies. I need {item_count} {item_name}, and don't drag it out too much, I'll give you 3 days.
Thank you, take the present:
%s - get that trophy
Brother wants meat, specifically - %s The deadline is 3 days.

Anyway. I've spent my whole life in the zone making meat from my grandmother's recipe. When I remember cooking her... Mm-hmm... Dribbling's worse than looking at a live grandmother. Will you get some raw meat?
Specifically, I need {item_count} {item_name}. I'll pay good for that, bro, but don't fucking make me wait, it'll take you 3 days for sure.
Well done, man. Here:
%s - find a gun for a mercenary
%s - we need to get these weapons in perfect condition. The deadline is 6 days.
Here's the thing: I need a reliable weapon that won't let me down, that won't jam in a shootout. Can you find one for me?
Okay. {item_name} is just what I need. I won't stay in debt, just don't put it off for long, 6 days is enough for you.
Perfect! Here, take this:
%s - weapons for the military
%s - we need to get these weapons in perfect condition. The deadline is 6 days.
Damn our supply! When they can't even supply a normal barrel. I need a reliable weapon that won't let me down, that won't jam in a shootout. Can you find one for me?
Okay. {item_name} is just what I need. Don't pull, I'm on a raid in 6 days. I won't be in debt.
Well thing! Here, take the work:
Bandit order
You signed up for a contract killing. The deadline is two days.

We've got an order. We're gonna take one down. He's just going somewhere with his habarah. If you kill him, you can keep the habar. Plus, I'll pay you upstairs. You've got two days to do it on time. Is that okay?
Oh, this is a real topic! Here you go:
Destroy the dangerous mutants
Clear the area for Clean Sky from mutants. The deadline is 2 days.

I'm a fighter, like a shitty bullet. Recently mutants bit, creatures, and then came the information that is not only me. We have to kill the creatures. I'll show you on your PDA where I last saw them. And don't take too long until they've gone somewhere, two days, I think you've had enough.
Thank you. Please accept this as a reward:
Destroy dangerous mutants for the glory of Monolith.
Destroy dangerous mutants. That is the will of the Monolith. The deadline is 24 hours.

A monolith in rage at brainless mutants. They killed one of the brothers, and He commanded in His wisdom to make the area safe. You don't have to keep the Monolith waiting, I think you have 24 hours before they kill somebody else.
Praise the Monolith, you're safe and the mutants are dead. Accept these gifts:
Patches for freeman
%s - Freeman asked to get them for him.
Hey, it's hard for our group lately here. Nail a couple of scum all, you take? I will not deprive time.
Well, such a thing - it is necessary to kill carrion, and it does not matter which one. Bring me {item_count} {item_name} as proof. I would have been calmer.
Respect bro! Hold:
Tear off chevrons for a loner
%s - the Duty man asked me to collect this for him.
Duty cleans the Zone not only from mutants, but also from bastards and freaks of all kinds. We need to collect something from their corpses. There no deadline.
I can't get enough of these freaks lately. Bring me {item_count} {item_name} as proof for the work done. Good luck.
Thank's man. Here, take it, while no one sees:
Find patches for stalker
%s - the stalker asked to rip it off for him.
I think it'll be easier for all of us if the population of freaks in the zone is significantly reduced. We need to collect something from the corpses. I will not deprive time.
{item_count} {item_name} - as evidence by itself. These freaks got me already, and it doesnt matter who you fill up, the main thing is the stripes. And I'll give you something for this.
Well thanks brother, bother. Hold:
Bring patches to brother
%s - the bandit asked me to sabotage it.
What I've been doing here, I've got to cut the tails, here. So, what do you think?
In short, there are a lot of assholes, they don't even squeeze in peace. So, kill a few and bring me patches. Bring me {item_count} {item_name}, then we'll agree on a good price, it's okay?
Bro, nice job. Well, my respect to you, take this:
Stalker Equipment
%s - the stalker asked me to find it. It's a 2-day runtime.
Uh, my gear broke down... Could you get me something?

{item_name} - find me a new one, I need one. Mine's completely worn out in the holes, except now you can let it in for patches. I'll give you a couple of days, or you'll have to buy a new one yourself. So, how are you?
Thank you, here you go:
Get a device
%s - the stalker asked me to find it for him. Execution time is 2 days.
Look, I lost my fucking device here. Or maybe it was stolen by someone... Can you help me get a new one?

So to be more specific, I need {item_count} {item_name}. If you bring it to me someday, I'll throw in some money, maybe something else. Just don't make me waiting, I'll give you 2 days, or you'll have to buy a new one. Well, how's that, huh?
Oh, thank you, man. Here's the money:
Supplies for stalker
%s - the stalker asked to find it for his needs. Exection time is 3 days.
I need to get something. Can you get me something?
Well, look, the scheme is like that - you bring me {item_count} {item_name} and the profits we share, in your favor of course, after all, I didn't even lift a finger. You got 3 days, all right?
Thank you, man. Here's the money:
Horns, hooves and tails
%s - the stalker asked me to find it. Exection time is 3 days.
I have one job. Could you get some mutant parts for me?

an you get {item_count} {item_name}? I have a hobby, you see. Or a craft, you might say. Anyway, I make stuff out of spare parts, souvenirs like people from the Big Land order them from me. The deadline is three days for you so I can make them. Agreed? If not, I'll find somebody else.
Thank you, man. Here's the money:
Destroy the lair of mutants.
Stalker asked me to clean out the lair. The execution time is 2 days.
I have a job for hunters. You're not one of them by chance? My partners and I are in the way of mutants, we need to clear their lair.
Thank you, man. Here's the money:
Pay back the debts.
We need to beat the debt out of this stalker any way we can. Execution time is 2 days.

Well, that's the way it is, the collector needs a little extra work. Even though there are no banks in the Zone, but somebody still has to do their job. We mercenaries often lend money. But sometimes they don't want to give it back, that's the problem. We have to press someone, the ladies have 2 days. And you'll get a percentage salary, of course.
You know, like a real collector. Maybe a permanent fixture with us, huh? Here's a percentage:
Pay back
This freak owes his brothers. The execution time is 2 days.
